verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, I shall now <S%H5595>perish<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: there is nothing <S%H2896>better<s%> for me than <S%H3588>that<s%> I <S%H4422>should<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> will <S%H2976>despair<s%> of <S%H1245>me<s%>, to seek me any more in all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: so shall I <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, he and the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were with <S%H397>him<s%>, unto Achish the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4582>Maoch<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with <S%H397>Achish<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, he and his <S%H582>men<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H1004>household<s%>, even <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, <S%H293>Ahinoam<s%> the <S%H3159>Jezreelitess<s%>, and <S%H26>Abigail<s%> the <S%H3762>Carmelitess<s%>, <S%H5037>Nabal<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath<s%>: and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> no more again for <S%H3254>him<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H397>Achish<s%>, If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, let them <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%>, that I may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5650>there<s%>: for why should thy servant <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4467>royal<s%> city with <S%H5892>thee<s%>?

Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>: wherefore <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%> pertaineth unto the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the days that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was a full <S%H3117>year<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> upon the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%>, and the <S%H1511>Girzites<s%>, and the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%>; for <S%H2007>those<s%> nations were the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, who were of <S%H5769>old<s%>, as thou <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur<s%>, even unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and saved neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>, and took <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and the <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and the <S%H899>apparel<s%>; and he <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%>.

And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Against <S%H408>whom<s%> have ye made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>? And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Against the <S%H5045>South<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and against the <S%H5045>South<s%> of the <S%H3397>Jerahmeelites<s%>, and against the <S%H5045>South<s%> of the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2421>saved<s%> neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Lest they should <S%H5046>tell<s%> of <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, So <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and so hath been his <S%H4941>manner<s%> all the <S%H3117>while<s%> he hath <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He hath made his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H887>utterly<s%> to <S%H887>abhor<s%> <S%H5650>him<s%>; therefore he shall be my servant for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
